body: Where tf japanese version? I can't read chinese. Just jp&eng

@Wikarian99PL I get that the Church tended to prefer commissioning painters to paint naked people; manly man with muscular muscles and petite, feminine woman at the peak of grace. But... you don't see lolis and underaged children getting fucked until they look with upturned eyes and drooling saliva while begging for their onii-chan to shove dicks in them. You tend not to get that in them even in the Rococo period of art. They showed actual sex scenes, yes. But not of children. Even Rococo porn never went pedo. Hentai on the other hands, gives pedophiles raging boners. Art tends not to go to that extent. The renaissance tended to show nudity for the intent of emphasising the raw beauty of the human body, nothing to do with pedophilia. And even for the pedos of Art, even Balthus had the standards not to show naked children licking yogurt dicks like Shoujo Ramune. Balthus'd have the decorum to insinuate with sexual inuendos.

Sometimes I wonder- if an ahegao like in page 199 were hung in a museum centuries from now where the concept of hentai has long since abolished because the government realised too many pedophiles were created from hentai, and page 199 was painted on a canvas, the oil paint glistening her countenance of the orgasming girl, would people looking at it look at it like a painting or would they get aroused, peeking into our natural human condition to get turned on by others cumming in bliss holding out a V sign? I don't know and I don't want to find out
ANOTHER ONE? Damn Ponco is a chad. I wish Fue was still working, then my life would be complete, but all these unstoppable works from ponco are a blessing themselves
讲真这作者的肉感和镜头角度真的赞，而且角度还很多变。就像炫技一样，只要生理角度允许就都要把乳房腰臀纳入镜头，而且都画的如在目前，感觉手心都仿佛有触感了。每个分镜的完成度都很高，真的很厉害。不知道dlsite有没有在卖，想去补个票支持一下了
